```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

inputPanel(
  checkboxInput("linear",
                label="Add linear regression?",
                value=FALSE)
)

renderPlot({
  thePlot = ggplot(faithful, aes(x=waiting, y=eruptions)) +
    geom_point()

  if(input$linear){
    thePlot = thePlot + stat_smooth(method="lm")
  }

  print(thePlot)
})
```
